titles.title: You are high, You are high, You are high and lifted up

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
You are high, You are high, You are high and lifted up
You are great, You are greatly to be praised
You are King, You are King, You are King of all the earth
You are Lord, sovereign over all

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
And I will sing, I will sing of all Youâ€™ve done
And I will bless, I will bless Your holy name
And I will declare the salvation of the Lord
For You are good, You are good to me

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
You are strong, You are strong, You are strong to rescue me
You are mighty, You are powerful to save
You are kind, You are kind and Your mercy does endure
And your love it never fails
